meanings.definition: A woman who receives or entertains guests.
meanings.sent1: The hostesses greeted the guests with warm smiles.
meanings.sent2: The hostesses made sure all the guests felt welcome.
meanings.sent3: The hostesses joked with the guests to make them feel at ease.
meanings.sent4: The hostesses were like the sun, radiating warmth to all who entered.
meanings.sent5: The hostesses' hospitality shone brightly throughout the evening.

meanings.definition: A woman who acts as a master of ceremonies or presenter.
meanings.sent1: The hostesses announced the next performer with grace.
meanings.sent2: The hostesses guided the audience through the event smoothly.
meanings.sent3: The hostesses added a touch of elegance to the ceremony.
meanings.sent4: The hostesses were the conductors of the event, orchestrating each moment.
meanings.sent5: The hostesses' presence commanded attention on the stage.

meanings.definition: A woman who manages a social gathering or event.
meanings.sent1: The hostesses coordinated the party decorations beautifully.
meanings.sent2: The hostesses ensured everything ran smoothly during the event.
meanings.sent3: The hostesses juggled multiple tasks effortlessly at the gathering.
meanings.sent4: The hostesses were the captains of the social ship, steering it to success.
meanings.sent5: The hostesses' organizational skills were the backbone of the event.
